<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Calculated Splash](/Feats.aspx?ID=99) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 77 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Demolitionist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=118) (Level 6)

</column>

---

You have calculated all the angles to maximize a bomb’s splash. When you throw an alchemical bomb with the [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) trait, you can cause the bomb to deal splash damage equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum 0) instead of the normal amount.

<title level="2">Calculated Splash leads to...</title>
[Controlled Blast](/Feats.aspx?ID=3243), [Expanded Splash](/Feats.aspx?ID=109)
